text: Khawubabuze (Muhammad) ngesixeko esasingaselwandle; ukugabadela kwabo ngokuphathelene nombandela weSabatha, ngexesha apho iintlanzi zabo zaya zaphuma zeza kubo ngomhla weSabatha, kodwa zingaphumi zize kubo ngemini ekungeyoSabatha. Salwenza lwaba njalo ke uvavanyo kubo, kuba babedla ngokuvukela imiyalelo ka- All√¢h
